JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Trier Industries A/S are looking for CNC-operators - multitasking machining center
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a skilled industrial technician or machinist for our production for setup and programming of our multitasking machining center.

It is a permanent employment with evening/night shifts.

Qualifications and competencies:

  • Yor are a trained industrial technician or machinist
  • You have experience with multitasking machining center
  • You have experience with Cam-programming (Gibbs Cam will be an advantage)
  • You have experience with setup and programming of machines
  • You can read a drawing and work independently

Personal qualifications:

  • You can work independently
  • You are quality-conscious about your work
  • You are positive, accommodating and a good colleague
  • You can handle small series and many lineups
  • You can speak and understand English

We offer:

  • Permanent employment
  • Salary according to qualifications
  • Good colleagues and a good working environment
  • A lot of different and challenging tasks in different materials

How to apply:

If you have questions about the job, you are welcome to contact Kim Frandsen, Skelmose on 60 14 80 43 or at kf@skelmose.eu.

Send your CV and relevant attachments to Kim Frandsen her.

We regularly call relevant candidates, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.

Start: As soon as possible

Trier Industries A/S is a modern machine factory with a team of highly skilled engineers and technicians with many years of experience. Our knowledge and expertise in mechanical design makes Trier Industries A/S in a position to make optimal structures and design that provides an effective and perfect solution, tailored to the costumers’ specific requirements. For further information www.trierindustries.dk
